DOC.brief_summary: To compare efficacy safety celecoxib versus ibuprofen subject osteoarthritis ( OA ) knee .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Celecoxib Versus Ibuprofen Treatment Osteoarthritis Knee ( United States )
DOC.criteria: Aged > = 40 year old Diagnosed OA knee accord American College Rheumatology OA flare state baseline visit Functional capacity class IIII Inflammatory arthritis gout pseudogout acute flare within past 2 year ( subject fibrositis fibromyalgia exclude ) Acute joint trauma index joint within past 3 month active symptom Score > =20 PHQ9 score > =1 PHQ9 item Use mobility assist device < 6 week use walker
